content:
This build was released on the 22nd of November, 2021.

General Changes:
 - Fast-travel system introduced.
 - Ability to switch between Mario and Luigi in the Castle Grounds.
 - FOV and aspect ratio settings were added to the pause screen.
 - The stars now use a 2d texture.
 - The verticies on Mario's model were fixed.

New Areas:
Course 1 Area 7: Goomba Hills
Course 12 Area 2: Monkey Slide
